channel.title: Entity Framework Core on Development: people, code & me
channel.description: Recent content in Entity Framework Core on Development: people, code & me

item.title: Using EF Core's migration with Docker and MySQL
item.description: In this post I explain how to create a .NET Core 2.0 console application which reads, and writes, data from MySQL, and uses Entity Framework Core, and migrations, in order to persist data and manage the DB schema. Furthermore I will show how to use Docker to be able to develop the application independently by the chosen environment. In order to highlight the needed steps, I split the post in this way:
